item.title: Delete
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“TheLetterQArousesMe, post:1, topic:478091”]The quest tab has been improved and made with multiple pages
~The first page is the default page: Where you can go to the other pages, save, and see the commands
~The second page is the pk rewards page: Buy PK Rewards.
~The third page you can access the bosses(they’ll be listed below)[/quote]

This sounds cool, could I see some pictures? Goodluck with the development.

Read full topic

item.title: Delete
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:9, topic:478091”][quote author=TheLetterQArousesMe link=topic=596289.msg4198953#msg4198953 date=1357880376]
Sorry for being somewhat new to java. I guess this isn’t really worth having it here, you’re right. I just felt the need to put it on here for some reason. sigh I question why I put it here, actually. Lol
[/quote]

There’s no need to apologize for being new. Everyone must start somewhere. MoparScape is known for having Members with “elite” attitudes directed towards “newbies”. They often rate themselves very high on the ‘Java Scale’ (1-10 Ten being the best most Members will say 8), when in actuality they are around a 2. Don’t let them discourage you, or don’t let me discourage you for that matter. You’re wrong though, It’s worth showing others that you’re trying and doing things. This is more than most newbies will do, so you’re not doing a bad job.[/quote]

Yeah that’s true, and oh I know all about that. I’d probably say I’m like a 0.5
Again I guess this is true, but I wish I did a lot more before making this thread. Haha.

Read full topic

item.title: Delete
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

TheLetterQArousesMe:

Sorry for being somewhat new to java. I guess this isn’t really worth having it here, you’re right. I just felt the need to put it on here for some reason. sigh I question why I put it here, actually. Lol

There’s no need to apologize for being new. Everyone must start somewhere. MoparScape is known for having Members with “elite” attitudes directed towards “newbies”. They often rate themselves very high on the ‘Java Scale’ (1-10 Ten being the best most Members will say 8), when in actuality they are around a 2. Don’t let them discourage you, or don’t let me discourage you for that matter. You’re wrong though, It’s worth showing others that you’re trying and doing things. This is more than most newbies will do, so you’re not doing a bad job.

Read full topic

item.title: Delete
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

Team_Rocket:

Hmm… you edited the Color of your Sprites and followed a Tutorial on how to add Chat Effects to the lower-revisioned Clients. I’m not being mean or anything, but that’s all I see so far. Good job ‘cleaning’ out your Client class around 450kb I suppose. May I suggest you create a Developmental Log so that more experienced programmers will become interested in this, instead of just writing it off as another common Server? I wish you the best of luck.

I don’t do stuff with the client usually, so you’re right all that’s in there is tutorials.
Ik the server’s not ‘great’ but it’s better than Allstarscape.
Sorry for being somewhat new to java. I guess this isn’t really worth having it here, you’re right. Oh and yeah 450 KB isn’t much but I just started working on making it smaller. For some reason I just felt the need to put this here. sigh I kinda wish I didn’t cause it’s not really worth having here XD
Grr I hate being dumb

Read full topic
